description: RedirectReference specifies the target in the current namespace that resolves into redirect URIs.  Only the 'Route' kind is currently allowed.

group.description: The group of the target that is being referred to.

kind.description: The kind of the target that is being referred to.  Currently, only 'Route' is allowed.

name.description: The name of the target that is being referred to. e.g. name of the Route.
